articles.author: Elisha Fieldstadt
articles.title: All children should wear masks in school this fall, even if vaccinated, according to pediatrics group - NBC News
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics on Monday recommended that all children over the age of 2 wear masks when returning to school this year, regardless of vaccination status.
articles.content:
The American Academy of Pediatrics on Monday recommended that all children over the age of 2 wear masks when returning to school this year, regardless of vaccination status.

articles.author: Bell Média
articles.title: Canada surpasses US in percentage of fully vaccinated residents even as vaccination rates slow down - Newstalk 610 CKTB (iHeartRadio)
articles.description: According to data from the CTV News COVID-19 vaccine tracker yesterday afternoon, 48.8 percent of Canadians have been fully vaccinated against the virus compared to 48.1 percent of Americans.
articles.content:
Canada has now surpassed the United States in terms of fully vaccinated residents.
